article: 13 countries had a big meeting in St Petersburg, Russia from November 21 to 24, 2014. The meeting was about the tiger. It is one of the animals in  _  One hundred years  _  , there were about 100,000 tigers in the world. But today scientists are  _  that the number of the tigers around the world may be  _  3200. Why has the number fallen so  _  ? The first reason is that tigers are meat-eating animals. They need a lot of land to find  _  food, but there is less and less land for tigers to  live on  . Also they live in the forests and people have  cut down  many trees there. The third reason is that people  _  them to use their skins for clothes, and their bodies  _  traditional medicine. They think it can make them  _  But now people have realized this and are doing  _  . At the meeting they  _  to spend more money on protecting them. China is one of the 13 countries where tigers live. There are about 50 wild tigers in China. They are  _  in southwest and northeast China. The Chinese government is working hard to  _  tigers. There is still a long way to go.
